title: Analyze A/B Test Results for a Headline
description: An A/B test was run on two different headlines for an article. An editor must analyze the results to see which performed better.

tasks.description: Open the A/B testing report in the CMS for the specified article.
Compare the click-through rate (CTR) for Headline A and Headline B.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies which headline had a higher CTR.

tasks.description: Declare the headline with the higher CTR as the winner and set it as the permanent headline for the article.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article is updated with the better-performing headline.
